## SenderResource class

Resource class to interact with [senders](https://community.onespan.com/documentation/onespan-sign/guides/feature-guides/developer/managing-senders)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SenderResource extends Resource 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Resource](./onespan-sign-node.resource.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [create(payload)](./onespan-sign-node.senderresource.create.md) |  | Creates a new sender. |
|  [delete(id)](./onespan-sign-node.senderresource.delete.md) |  | Deletes a specified Sender from an account. |
|  [deleteDefaultSignature(senderId)](./onespan-sign-node.senderresource.deletedefaultsignature.md) |  | Deletes the image that is being used by a recipient as their default signature when signing a transaction. |
|  [getAll(params)](./onespan-sign-node.senderresource.getall.md) |  | Retrieves a list of the users in an account. Optional query parameters can be used to filter the list. By default, only one sender is retrieved. To retrieve additional users you must modify the “to” and “from” parameters, where each number in the parameter corresponds to a user. For example: to = 3 from = 10 will return users 3 to 10 in the user list. |
|  [getDefaultSignature(senderId)](./onespan-sign-node.senderresource.getdefaultsignature.md) |  | Retrieves the image that is being used by a recipient as their default signature when signing a transaction. |
|  [getOne(id)](./onespan-sign-node.senderresource.getone.md) |  | Retrieves detailed Account information about a specified user. |
|  [invite(senderId)](./onespan-sign-node.senderresource.invite.md) |  | Sends an email invitation to a user. The user will receive an invitation link and a token identifying the account. |
|  [setDefaultSignature(senderId, signatureImage)](./onespan-sign-node.senderresource.setdefaultsignature.md) |  | Uploads an image to be used by a recipient as their default signature when signing a transaction. |
